title: Opening active ticket
body: How i open a currently active ticket? I go to the support page and then to my tickets. Its awaiting my response but its not letting me open it so i can respond.

replies.body: If this was an account recovery ticket, you should be able to find the email in your email inbox and simply respond to it there! If that's not working though, feel free to shoot us another ticket. Just make sure you send the original ticket number so that we can reference it for you.
